entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
